TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ItemCollection : System.Windows.Data.CollectionView, System.Collections.IList, System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping, System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView, System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem, System.ComponentModel.IItemProperties, System.Windows.IWeakEventListener

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ItemCollection extends System.Windows.Data.CollectionView implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem, class System.ComponentModel.IItemProperties, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener

Public NotInheritable Class ItemCollection Inherits CollectionView Implements ICollectionViewLiveShaping, IEditableCollectionView, IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem, IItemProperties, IList, IWeakEventListener

public ref class ItemCollection sealed : System::Windows::Data::CollectionView, System::Collections::IList, System::ComponentModel::ICollectionViewLiveShaping, System::ComponentModel::IEditableCollectionView, System::ComponentModel::IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem, System::ComponentModel::IItemProperties, System::Windows::IWeakEventListener

summary.span: 保存項目清單，這些項目會構成 的內容。

span.span: Holds the list of items that constitute the content of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會維護集合的項目，例如字串、 物件、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]節點、 元素和其他集合。 maintains a collection of items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, and other collections. 使用中的資料產生其內容。An uses the data in the to generate its content. 如果您想要彙總多個集合，將指派至屬性您。If you want to aggregate more than one collection, assign a to the property of your . 使用屬性或屬性來指定應該用來產生的內容集合您。Use either the property or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 當設定屬性，則集合將會進行唯讀固定大小。When the property is set, the collection will be made read-only and fixed-size. 這表示，如果您使用屬性，您無法加入、 刪除或變更項目中的直接。This means that if you are using the property, you cannot add, delete, or change items in the directly. 是，因此提供的集合檢視的功能，例如排序、 分組和篩選。 is a and therefore provides collection view functionalities, such as sorting, grouping, and filtering. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱、和。For more information, see , , and . 如需集合檢視的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 如果您有，例如內容，您可以使用屬性來存取，這是檢視。If you have an , such as a that has content, you can use the property to access the , which is a view. 因為該檢視，然後您可以使用檢視相關的功能，例如排序、 篩選和群組。Because it is a view, you can then use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping. 請注意，當設定 ItemsSource，檢視作業委派給檢視 ItemsSource 集合。Note that when ItemsSource is set, the view operations delegate to the view over the ItemsSource collection. 因此，ItemCollection 支援排序、 篩檢與群組才支援它們的委派的檢視。Therefore, the ItemCollection supports sorting, filtering, and grouping only if the delegated view supported them. 下列範例顯示如何排序的內容名為`myListBox`。The following example shows how to sort the content of a named `myListBox`. 在此範例中，`Content`是要排序之屬性的名稱。In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by. [!code-csharp[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#sort)] [!code-vb[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#sort)] 當您這樣做時，檢視可能會或可能不是預設檢視中的，根據如何設定資料最多上您。When you do this, the view might or might not be the default view, depending on how the data is set up on your . 例如，當屬性繫結至，檢視您取得使用屬性不是預設檢視。For example, when the property is bound to a , the view that you obtain using the property is not the default view. 如果您繫結 (使用屬性)，則您可以執行下列命令以取得預設檢視：If your is bound (you are using the property), then you can do the following to get the default view: [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#myview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#myview)] [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getview)] 或者，您可以在其中指定篩選、 排序及群組中的準則[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用。Alternately, you can specify filtering, sorting, and grouping criteria in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IDisposable DeferRefresh() cil managed
Public Overrides Function DeferRefresh () As IDisposable

summary.span: 進入延後循環，您可以用來合併變更到檢視，並且延遲自動重新整理。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 物件，可用來處置呼叫物件。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常用來建立`using`範圍，然後將多個檢視變更呼叫放在範圍內。This method is typically used to create a `using` scope and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 延後循環結束之前，這會延遲自動重新整理。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

span.span: Filtering is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來測試是否目前的實作會支援排序，然後再加入物件加入至。Use the property to test whether the current implementation supports sorting before adding objects to the . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性可以設定只能由存取的集合物件與使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can be set only by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 要存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀的集合本身時為讀寫。The property to access the collection object is read-only, while the collection itself is read-write.
